Name: Mystic Evocation
Story Background: In times of need, the mages of Azorius call upon ancestral incantations to bend the fabric of reality to their will.
Ability: Counter target noncreature spell unless its controller pays 1. If that spell is countered this way, scry 1.
Appearance Description: The card depicts an Azorius mage invoking an ancient sigil, as the air around them shimmers with arcane energy.
